attributes.action: To classify all animal abuse as a hate crime.
attributes.background: At the moment a hate crime incident is any incident which the victim, or anyone else, thinks is based on someones prejudice towards them because of their race, religion, sexual orientation, disability or because they are transgender. This should apply to different species as well.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. 

We're not sure what you mean by "classify all animal abuse as a hate crime". 

The Government is already taking action to increase sentences for people accused of animal abuse. You can find out more here: 

https://www.gov.uk/government/news/sentences-for-animal-cruelty-to-increase-tenfold-to-five-years

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
